topics.body:
Speaking of Call of Duty; this years sales for the latest game versus the game the previous year is down 27% and over the past five years it's lost more than 50% of it's total sales.

To make it short: Call of Duty is officially on it's last legs as a franchise; either the next game or the game after that will probably be the last games in the franchise.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
